member.name: M:CC.Utilities.Interop.User32.GetClientRect(System.IntPtr,CC.Utilities.Interop.RECT)
member.summary: The GetClientRect function retrieves the coordinates of a window's client area. The client coordinates specify the upper-left and lower-right corners of the client area. Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of a window's client area, the coordinates of the upper-left corner are (0,0).
member.param: [in] Handle to the window whose client coordinates are to be retrieved.
[out] A that receives the client coordinates. The left and top members are zero. The right and bottom members contain the width and height of the window.
